headline: North America Ammunition Market Report by Caliber, Product, End Use, Country and Company Analysis, 2025-2033
summary: The North America Ammunition Market is projected to grow from US$ 10.37 billion in 2024 to US$ 13.55 billion by 2033, at a CAGR of 3.02%. This growth is driven by civilian firearm demand, defense modernization, and advanced ammo technologies. The market's expansion is supported by military and civilian uses like defense, law enforcement, and sports shooting. Major trends include eco-friendly rounds and precision-guided munitions. Challenges include stringent regulations and supply chain issues.
